when.expression: #[sizeOf((payload filterObject ((value, key, index) -> key ~= "id" or key ~= "name" or key ~= "surname" or key ~= "citizenship" or key ~= "stateFrom" or key ~= "symptoms" or key ~= "days_left" or key ~= "id_hospital" ))) == 8]

set-payload.doc:name: Set Payload

when.expression: #[(vars.fileData.hotspots filter ((item, index) -> item contains payload.stateFrom))[0] == payload.stateFrom]

ee:variables.ee:set-variable:
%dw 2.0 output application/json
var empty = (vars.hospitals map $ filter $.status=="empty")[0].name var slightly = (vars.hospitals map $ filter $.status=="slightly")[0].name var partially = (vars.hospitals map $ filter $.status=="partially")[0].name var almostFull = (vars.hospitals map $ filter $.status=="almostFull")[0].name
---
if (isEmpty(empty)) if (isEmpty(slightly)) if (isEmpty(partially)) if(isEmpty(almostFull)) null else almostFull else partially else slightly else empty

db:insert.db:sql: INSERT INTO persons (id, name, surname, citizenship, stateFrom, symptoms, days_left, days_isolation, id_hospital) VALUES (:id, :name, :surname, :citizenship, :stateFrom, :symptoms, :days_left, :days_isolation, :id_hospital);
db:insert.db:input-parameters: #[{ "id": payload.id, "name": payload.name, "surname": payload.surname, "citizenship": payload.citizenship, "stateFrom": payload.stateFrom, "symptoms": payload.symptoms, "days_left": vars.days_left, "days_isolation": vars.days_left, "id_hospital" : vars.hospitalName }]

logger.message: User not inserted in hospital cause has no symptoms.

set-variable.value: #[output application/json var arr = [payload.days_isolation, payload.days_left] --- arr[0] as Number - arr[1] as Number]

db:update.doc:name: Subtract 1 day
db:update.db:sql: UPDATE persons SET days_left = days_left - 1 WHERE days_left != 0

db:insert.db:sql: INSERT INTO history (id, name, surname, citizenship, stateFrom, symptoms, days_left, id_hospital) VALUES (:id, :name, :surname, :citizenship, :stateFrom, :symptoms, :days_left, :id_hospital);
